00057 typedef enum {
00058     GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX_STATE = 1,
00059     GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL_STATE = 2,
00060     GPU_BUFFER_TEXCOORD_STATE = 4,
00061     GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE = 8,
00062     GPU_BUFFER_ELEMENT_STATE = 16,
00063 } GPUBufferState;
00064 
00065 #define MAX_GPU_ATTRIB_DATA 32
00066 
00067 /* material number is an 16-bit short and the range of short is from -16383 to 16383 (assume material number is non-negative) */
00068 #define MAX_MATERIALS 16384

00070 /* -1 - undefined, 0 - vertex arrays, 1 - VBOs */
00071 static int useVBOs = -1;
00072 static GPUBufferState GLStates = 0;
00073 static GPUAttrib attribData[MAX_GPU_ATTRIB_DATA] = { { -1, 0, 0 } };

00075 /* stores recently-deleted buffers so that new buffers won't have to
00076  * be recreated as often
00077  *
00078  * only one instance of this pool is created, stored in
00079  * gpu_buffer_pool
00080  *
00081  * note that the number of buffers in the pool is usually limited to
00082  * MAX_FREE_GPU_BUFFERS, but this limit may be exceeded temporarily
00083  * when a GPUBuffer is released outside the main thread; due to OpenGL
00084  * restrictions it cannot be immediately released
00085  */
00086 typedef struct GPUBufferPool {
00087     /* number of allocated buffers stored */
00088     int totbuf;
00089     /* actual allocated length of the array */
00090     int maxsize;
00091     GPUBuffer **buffers;
00092 } GPUBufferPool;
00093 #define MAX_FREE_GPU_BUFFERS 8
00094 
00095 /* create a new GPUBufferPool */
00096 static GPUBufferPool *gpu_buffer_pool_new(void)
00097 {
00098     GPUBufferPool *pool;
00099 
00100     /* enable VBOs if supported */
00101     if (useVBOs == -1)
00102         useVBOs = (GLEW_ARB_vertex_buffer_object ? 1 : 0);
00103 
00104     pool = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUBufferPool), "GPUBuffer");
00105 
00106     pool->maxsize = MAX_FREE_GPU_BUFFERS;
00107     pool->buffers = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUBuffer*)*pool->maxsize,
00108                     "GPUBuffer.buffers");
00109 
00110     return pool;
00111 }
00112 
00113 /* remove a GPUBuffer from the pool (does not free the GPUBuffer) */
00114 static void gpu_buffer_pool_remove_index(GPUBufferPool *pool, int index)
00115 {
00116     int i;
00117 
00118     if (!pool || index < 0 || index >= pool->totbuf)
00119         return;
00120 
00121     /* shift entries down, overwriting the buffer at `index' */
00122     for (i = index; i < pool->totbuf - 1; i++)
00123         pool->buffers[i] = pool->buffers[i+1];
00124 
00125     /* clear the last entry */
00126     if (pool->totbuf > 0)
00127         pool->buffers[pool->totbuf - 1] = NULL;
00128 
00129     pool->totbuf--;
00130 }
00131 
00132 /* delete the last entry in the pool */
00133 static void gpu_buffer_pool_delete_last(GPUBufferPool *pool)
00134 {
00135     GPUBuffer *last;
00136 
00137     if (pool->totbuf <= 0)
00138         return;
00139 
00140     /* get the last entry */
00141     if (!(last = pool->buffers[pool->totbuf - 1]))
00142         return;
00143 
00144     /* delete the buffer's data */
00145     if (useVBOs)
00146         glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &last->id);
00147     else
00148         MEM_freeN(last->pointer);
00149 
00150     /* delete the buffer and remove from pool */
00151     MEM_freeN(last);
00152     pool->totbuf--;
00153     pool->buffers[pool->totbuf] = NULL;
00154 }
00155 
00156 /* free a GPUBufferPool; also frees the data in the pool's
00157  * GPUBuffers */
00158 static void gpu_buffer_pool_free(GPUBufferPool *pool)
00159 {
00160     if (!pool)
00161         return;
00162     
00163     while (pool->totbuf)
00164         gpu_buffer_pool_delete_last(pool);
00165 
00166     MEM_freeN(pool->buffers);
00167     MEM_freeN(pool);
00168 }
00169 
00170 static GPUBufferPool *gpu_buffer_pool = NULL;
00171 static GPUBufferPool *gpu_get_global_buffer_pool(void)
00172 {
00173     /* initialize the pool */
00174     if (!gpu_buffer_pool)
00175         gpu_buffer_pool = gpu_buffer_pool_new();
00176 
00177     return gpu_buffer_pool;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void GPU_global_buffer_pool_free(void)
00181 {
00182     gpu_buffer_pool_free(gpu_buffer_pool);
00183     gpu_buffer_pool = NULL;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /* get a GPUBuffer of at least `size' bytes; uses one from the buffer
00187  * pool if possible, otherwise creates a new one */
00188 GPUBuffer *GPU_buffer_alloc(int size)
00189 {
00190     GPUBufferPool *pool;
00191     GPUBuffer *buf;
00192     int i, bufsize, bestfit = -1;
00193 
00194     pool = gpu_get_global_buffer_pool();
00195 
00196     /* not sure if this buffer pool code has been profiled much,
00197      * seems to me that the graphics driver and system memory
00198      * management might do this stuff anyway. --nicholas
00199      */
00200 
00201     /* check the global buffer pool for a recently-deleted buffer
00202      * that is at least as big as the request, but not more than
00203      * twice as big */
00204     for (i = 0; i < pool->totbuf; i++) {
00205         bufsize = pool->buffers[i]->size;
00206 
00207         /* check for an exact size match */
00208         if (bufsize == size) {
00209             bestfit = i;
00210             break;
00211         }
00212         /* smaller buffers won't fit data and buffers at least
00213          * twice as big are a waste of memory */
00214         else if (bufsize > size && size > (bufsize / 2)) {
00215             /* is it closer to the required size than the
00216              * last appropriate buffer found. try to save
00217              * memory */
00218             if (bestfit == -1 || pool->buffers[bestfit]->size > bufsize) {
00219                 bestfit = i;
00220             }
00221         }
00222     }
00223 
00224     /* if an acceptable buffer was found in the pool, remove it
00225      * from the pool and return it */
00226     if (bestfit != -1) {
00227         buf = pool->buffers[bestfit];
00228         gpu_buffer_pool_remove_index(pool, bestfit);
00229         return buf;
00230     }
00231 
00232     /* no acceptable buffer found in the pool, create a new one */
00233     buf = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUBuffer), "GPUBuffer");
00234     buf->size = size;
00235 
00236     if (useVBOs == 1) {
00237         /* create a new VBO and initialize it to the requested
00238          * size */
00239         glGenBuffersARB(1, &buf->id);
00240         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buf->id);
00241         glBufferDataARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, size, NULL, GL_STATIC_DRAW_ARB);
00242         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
00243     }
00244     else {
00245         buf->pointer = MEM_mallocN(size, "GPUBuffer.pointer");
00246         
00247         /* purpose of this seems to be dealing with
00248          * out-of-memory errors? looks a bit iffy to me
00249          * though, at least on Linux I expect malloc() would
00250          * just overcommit. --nicholas */
00251         while (!buf->pointer && pool->totbuf > 0) {
00252             gpu_buffer_pool_delete_last(pool);
00253             buf->pointer = MEM_mallocN(size, "GPUBuffer.pointer");
00254         }
00255         if (!buf->pointer)
00256             return NULL;
00257     }
00258 
00259     return buf;
00260 }
00261 
00262 /* release a GPUBuffer; does not free the actual buffer or its data,
00263  * but rather moves it to the pool of recently-freed buffers for
00264  * possible re-use*/
00265 void GPU_buffer_free(GPUBuffer *buffer)
00266 {
00267     GPUBufferPool *pool;
00268     int i;
00269 
00270     if (!buffer)
00271         return;
00272 
00273     pool = gpu_get_global_buffer_pool();
00274 
00275     /* free the last used buffer in the queue if no more space, but only
00276      * if we are in the main thread. for e.g. rendering or baking it can
00277      * happen that we are in other thread and can't call OpenGL, in that
00278      * case cleanup will be done GPU_buffer_pool_free_unused */
00279     if (BLI_thread_is_main()) {
00280         /* in main thread, safe to decrease size of pool back
00281          * down to MAX_FREE_GPU_BUFFERS */
00282         while (pool->totbuf >= MAX_FREE_GPU_BUFFERS)
00283             gpu_buffer_pool_delete_last(pool);
00284     }
00285     else {
00286         /* outside of main thread, can't safely delete the
00287          * buffer, so increase pool size */
00288         if (pool->maxsize == pool->totbuf) {
00289             pool->maxsize += MAX_FREE_GPU_BUFFERS;
00290             pool->buffers = MEM_reallocN(pool->buffers,
00291                              sizeof(GPUBuffer*) * pool->maxsize);
00292         }
00293     }
00294 
00295     /* shift pool entries up by one */
00296     for (i = pool->totbuf; i > 0; i--)
00297         pool->buffers[i] = pool->buffers[i-1];
00298 
00299     /* insert the buffer into the beginning of the pool */
00300     pool->buffers[0] = buffer;
00301     pool->totbuf++;
00302 }

00304 typedef struct GPUVertPointLink {
00305     struct GPUVertPointLink *next;
00306     /* -1 means uninitialized */
00307     int point_index;
00308 } GPUVertPointLink;
00309 
00310 /* add a new point to the list of points related to a particular
00311  * vertex */
00312 static void gpu_drawobject_add_vert_point(GPUDrawObject *gdo, int vert_index, int point_index)
00313 {
00314     GPUVertPointLink *lnk;
00315 
00316     lnk = &gdo->vert_points[vert_index];
00317 
00318     /* if first link is in use, add a new link at the end */
00319     if (lnk->point_index != -1) {
00320         /* get last link */
00321         for (; lnk->next; lnk = lnk->next);
00322 
00323         /* add a new link from the pool */
00324         lnk = lnk->next = &gdo->vert_points_mem[gdo->vert_points_usage];
00325         gdo->vert_points_usage++;
00326     }
00327 
00328     lnk->point_index = point_index;
00329 }
00330 
00331 /* update the vert_points and triangle_to_mface fields with a new
00332  * triangle */
00333 static void gpu_drawobject_add_triangle(GPUDrawObject *gdo,
00334                     int base_point_index,
00335                     int face_index,
00336                     int v1, int v2, int v3)
00337 {
00338     int i, v[3] = {v1, v2, v3};
00339     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00340         gpu_drawobject_add_vert_point(gdo, v[i], base_point_index + i);
00341     gdo->triangle_to_mface[base_point_index / 3] = face_index;
00342 }
00343 
00344 /* for each vertex, build a list of points related to it; these lists
00345  * are stored in an array sized to the number of vertices */
00346 static void gpu_drawobject_init_vert_points(GPUDrawObject *gdo, MFace *f, int totface)
00347 {
00348     GPUBufferMaterial *mat;
00349     int i, mat_orig_to_new[MAX_MATERIALS];
00350 
00351     /* allocate the array and space for links */
00352     gdo->vert_points = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUVertPointLink) * gdo->totvert,
00353                        "GPUDrawObject.vert_points");
00354     gdo->vert_points_mem = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUVertPointLink) * gdo->tot_triangle_point,
00355                           "GPUDrawObject.vert_points_mem");
00356     gdo->vert_points_usage = 0;
00357 
00358     /* build a map from the original material indices to the new
00359      * GPUBufferMaterial indices */
00360     for (i = 0; i < gdo->totmaterial; i++)
00361         mat_orig_to_new[gdo->materials[i].mat_nr] = i;
00362 
00363     /* -1 indicates the link is not yet used */
00364     for (i = 0; i < gdo->totvert; i++)
00365         gdo->vert_points[i].point_index = -1;
00366 
00367     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++, f++) {
00368         mat = &gdo->materials[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]];
00369 
00370         /* add triangle */
00371         gpu_drawobject_add_triangle(gdo, mat->start + mat->totpoint,
00372                         i, f->v1, f->v2, f->v3);
00373         mat->totpoint += 3;
00374 
00375         /* add second triangle for quads */
00376         if (f->v4) {
00377             gpu_drawobject_add_triangle(gdo, mat->start + mat->totpoint,
00378                             i, f->v3, f->v4, f->v1);
00379             mat->totpoint += 3;
00380         }
00381     }
00382 
00383     /* map any unused vertices to loose points */
00384     for (i = 0; i < gdo->totvert; i++) {
00385         if (gdo->vert_points[i].point_index == -1) {
00386             gdo->vert_points[i].point_index = gdo->tot_triangle_point + gdo->tot_loose_point;
00387             gdo->tot_loose_point++;
00388         }
00389     }
00390 }
00391 
00392 /* see GPUDrawObject's structure definition for a description of the
00393  * data being initialized here */
00394 GPUDrawObject *GPU_drawobject_new( DerivedMesh *dm )
00395 {
00396     GPUDrawObject *gdo;
00397     MFace *mface;
00398     int points_per_mat[MAX_MATERIALS];
00399     int i, curmat, curpoint, totface;
00400 
00401     mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00402     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00403 
00404     /* get the number of points used by each material, treating
00405      * each quad as two triangles */
00406     memset(points_per_mat, 0, sizeof(int)*MAX_MATERIALS);
00407     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++)
00408         points_per_mat[mface[i].mat_nr] += mface[i].v4 ? 6 : 3;
00409 
00410     /* create the GPUDrawObject */
00411     gdo = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUDrawObject),"GPUDrawObject");
00412     gdo->totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00413     gdo->totedge = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00414 
00415     /* count the number of materials used by this DerivedMesh */
00416     for (i = 0; i < MAX_MATERIALS; i++) {
00417         if (points_per_mat[i] > 0)
00418             gdo->totmaterial++;
00419     }
00420 
00421     /* allocate an array of materials used by this DerivedMesh */
00422     gdo->materials = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(GPUBufferMaterial) * gdo->totmaterial,
00423                      "GPUDrawObject.materials");
00424 
00425     /* initialize the materials array */
00426     for (i = 0, curmat = 0, curpoint = 0; i < MAX_MATERIALS; i++) {
00427         if (points_per_mat[i] > 0) {
00428             gdo->materials[curmat].start = curpoint;
00429             gdo->materials[curmat].totpoint = 0;
00430             gdo->materials[curmat].mat_nr = i;
00431 
00432             curpoint += points_per_mat[i];
00433             curmat++;
00434         }
00435     }
00436 
00437     /* store total number of points used for triangles */
00438     gdo->tot_triangle_point = curpoint;
00439 
00440     gdo->triangle_to_mface = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * (gdo->tot_triangle_point / 3),
00441                      "GPUDrawObject.triangle_to_mface");
00442 
00443     gpu_drawobject_init_vert_points(gdo, mface, totface);
00444 
00445     return gdo;
00446 }
00447 
00448 void GPU_drawobject_free(DerivedMesh *dm)
00449 {
00450     GPUDrawObject *gdo;
00451 
00452     if (!dm || !(gdo = dm->drawObject))
00453         return;
00454 
00455     MEM_freeN(gdo->materials);
00456     MEM_freeN(gdo->triangle_to_mface);
00457     MEM_freeN(gdo->vert_points);
00458     MEM_freeN(gdo->vert_points_mem);
00459     GPU_buffer_free(gdo->points);
00460     GPU_buffer_free(gdo->normals);
00461     GPU_buffer_free(gdo->uv);
00462     GPU_buffer_free(gdo->colors);
00463     GPU_buffer_free(gdo->edges);
00464     GPU_buffer_free(gdo->uvedges);
00465 
00466     MEM_freeN(gdo);
00467     dm->drawObject = NULL;
00468 }

00470 typedef void (*GPUBufferCopyFunc)(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray, int *index,
00471                                   int *mat_orig_to_new, void *user_data);
00472 
00473 static GPUBuffer *gpu_buffer_setup(DerivedMesh *dm, GPUDrawObject *object,
00474                                    int vector_size, int size, GLenum target,
00475                                    void *user, GPUBufferCopyFunc copy_f)
00476 {
00477     GPUBufferPool *pool;
00478     GPUBuffer *buffer;
00479     float *varray;
00480     int mat_orig_to_new[MAX_MATERIALS];
00481     int *cur_index_per_mat;
00482     int i;
00483     int success;
00484     GLboolean uploaded;
00485 
00486     pool = gpu_get_global_buffer_pool();
00487 
00488     /* alloc a GPUBuffer; fall back to legacy mode on failure */
00489     if (!(buffer = GPU_buffer_alloc(size)))
00490         dm->drawObject->legacy = 1;
00491 
00492     /* nothing to do for legacy mode */
00493     if (dm->drawObject->legacy)
00494         return NULL;
00495 
00496     cur_index_per_mat = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int)*object->totmaterial,
00497                     "GPU_buffer_setup.cur_index_per_mat");
00498     for (i = 0; i < object->totmaterial; i++) {
00499         /* for each material, the current index to copy data to */
00500         cur_index_per_mat[i] = object->materials[i].start * vector_size;
00501 
00502         /* map from original material index to new
00503          * GPUBufferMaterial index */
00504         mat_orig_to_new[object->materials[i].mat_nr] = i;
00505     }
00506 
00507     if (useVBOs) {
00508         success = 0;
00509 
00510         while (!success) {
00511             /* bind the buffer and discard previous data,
00512              * avoids stalling gpu */
00513             glBindBufferARB(target, buffer->id);
00514             glBufferDataARB(target, buffer->size, NULL, GL_STATIC_DRAW_ARB);
00515 
00516             /* attempt to map the buffer */
00517             if (!(varray = glMapBufferARB(target, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB))) {
00518                 /* failed to map the buffer; delete it */
00519                 GPU_buffer_free(buffer);
00520                 gpu_buffer_pool_delete_last(pool);
00521                 buffer= NULL;
00522 
00523                 /* try freeing an entry from the pool
00524                  * and reallocating the buffer */
00525                 if (pool->totbuf > 0) {
00526                     gpu_buffer_pool_delete_last(pool);
00527                     buffer = GPU_buffer_alloc(size);
00528                 }
00529 
00530                 /* allocation still failed; fall back
00531                  * to legacy mode */
00532                 if (!buffer) {
00533                     dm->drawObject->legacy = 1;
00534                     success = 1;
00535                 }
00536             }
00537             else {
00538                 success = 1;
00539             }
00540         }
00541 
00542         /* check legacy fallback didn't happen */
00543         if (dm->drawObject->legacy == 0) {
00544             uploaded = GL_FALSE;
00545             /* attempt to upload the data to the VBO */
00546             while (uploaded == GL_FALSE) {
00547                 (*copy_f)(dm, varray, cur_index_per_mat, mat_orig_to_new, user);
00548                 /* glUnmapBuffer returns GL_FALSE if
00549                  * the data store is corrupted; retry
00550                  * in that case */
00551                 uploaded = glUnmapBufferARB(target);
00552             }
00553         }
00554         glBindBufferARB(target, 0);
00555     }
00556     else {
00557         /* VBO not supported, use vertex array fallback */
00558         if (buffer->pointer) {
00559             varray = buffer->pointer;
00560             (*copy_f)(dm, varray, cur_index_per_mat, mat_orig_to_new, user);
00561         }
00562         else {
00563             dm->drawObject->legacy = 1;
00564         }
00565     }
00566 
00567     MEM_freeN(cur_index_per_mat);
00568 
00569     return buffer;
00570 }
00571 
00572 static void GPU_buffer_copy_vertex(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray, int *index, int *mat_orig_to_new, void *UNUSED(user))
00573 {
00574     MVert *mvert;
00575     MFace *f;
00576     int i, j, start, totface;
00577 
00578     mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00579     f = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00580 
00581     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00582     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++, f++) {
00583         start = index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]];
00584 
00585         /* v1 v2 v3 */
00586         copy_v3_v3(&varray[start], mvert[f->v1].co);
00587         copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+3], mvert[f->v2].co);
00588         copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+6], mvert[f->v3].co);
00589         index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 9;
00590 
00591         if (f->v4) {
00592             /* v3 v4 v1 */
00593             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+9], mvert[f->v3].co);
00594             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+12], mvert[f->v4].co);
00595             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+15], mvert[f->v1].co);
00596             index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 9;
00597         }
00598     }
00599 
00600     /* copy loose points */
00601     j = dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point*3;
00602     for (i = 0; i < dm->drawObject->totvert; i++) {
00603         if (dm->drawObject->vert_points[i].point_index >= dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point) {
00604             copy_v3_v3(&varray[j],mvert[i].co);
00605             j+=3;
00606         }
00607     }
00608 }
00609 
00610 static void GPU_buffer_copy_normal(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray, int *index, int *mat_orig_to_new, void *UNUSED(user))
00611 {
00612     int i, totface;
00613     int start;
00614     float f_no[3];
00615 
00616     float *nors= dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_NORMAL);
00617     MVert *mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00618     MFace *f = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00619 
00620     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00621     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++, f++) {
00622         const int smoothnormal = (f->flag & ME_SMOOTH);
00623 
00624         start = index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]];
00625         index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += f->v4 ? 18 : 9;
00626 
00627         if (smoothnormal) {
00628             /* copy vertex normal */
00629             normal_short_to_float_v3(&varray[start], mvert[f->v1].no);
00630             normal_short_to_float_v3(&varray[start+3], mvert[f->v2].no);
00631             normal_short_to_float_v3(&varray[start+6], mvert[f->v3].no);
00632 
00633             if (f->v4) {
00634                 normal_short_to_float_v3(&varray[start+9], mvert[f->v3].no);
00635                 normal_short_to_float_v3(&varray[start+12], mvert[f->v4].no);
00636                 normal_short_to_float_v3(&varray[start+15], mvert[f->v1].no);
00637             }
00638         }
00639         else if (nors) {
00640             /* copy cached face normal */
00641             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start], &nors[i*3]);
00642             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+3], &nors[i*3]);
00643             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+6], &nors[i*3]);
00644 
00645             if (f->v4) {
00646                 copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+9], &nors[i*3]);
00647                 copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+12], &nors[i*3]);
00648                 copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+15], &nors[i*3]);
00649             }
00650         }
00651         else {
00652             /* calculate face normal */
00653             if (f->v4)
00654                 normal_quad_v3(f_no, mvert[f->v1].co, mvert[f->v2].co, mvert[f->v3].co, mvert[f->v4].co);
00655             else
00656                 normal_tri_v3(f_no, mvert[f->v1].co, mvert[f->v2].co, mvert[f->v3].co);
00657 
00658             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start], f_no);
00659             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+3], f_no);
00660             copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+6], f_no);
00661 
00662             if (f->v4) {
00663                 copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+9], f_no);
00664                 copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+12], f_no);
00665                 copy_v3_v3(&varray[start+15], f_no);
00666             }
00667         }
00668     }
00669 }
00670 
00671 static void GPU_buffer_copy_uv(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray, int *index, int *mat_orig_to_new, void *UNUSED(user))
00672 {
00673     int start;
00674     int i, totface;
00675 
00676     MTFace *mtface;
00677     MFace *f;
00678 
00679     if (!(mtface = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE)))
00680         return;
00681     f = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00682         
00683     totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00684     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++, f++) {
00685         start = index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]];
00686 
00687         /* v1 v2 v3 */
00688         copy_v2_v2(&varray[start],mtface[i].uv[0]);
00689         copy_v2_v2(&varray[start+2],mtface[i].uv[1]);
00690         copy_v2_v2(&varray[start+4],mtface[i].uv[2]);
00691         index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 6;
00692 
00693         if (f->v4) {
00694             /* v3 v4 v1 */
00695             copy_v2_v2(&varray[start+6],mtface[i].uv[2]);
00696             copy_v2_v2(&varray[start+8],mtface[i].uv[3]);
00697             copy_v2_v2(&varray[start+10],mtface[i].uv[0]);
00698             index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 6;
00699         }
00700     }
00701 }
00702 
00703 
00704 static void GPU_buffer_copy_color3(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray_, int *index, int *mat_orig_to_new, void *user)
00705 {
00706     int i, totface;
00707     char *varray = (char *)varray_;
00708     char *mcol = (char *)user;
00709     MFace *f = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00710 
00711     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00712     for (i=0; i < totface; i++, f++) {
00713         int start = index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]];
00714 
00715         /* v1 v2 v3 */
00716         copy_v3_v3_char(&varray[start], &mcol[i*12]);
00717         copy_v3_v3_char(&varray[start+3], &mcol[i*12+3]);
00718         copy_v3_v3_char(&varray[start+6], &mcol[i*12+6]);
00719         index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 9;
00720 
00721         if (f->v4) {
00722             /* v3 v4 v1 */
00723             copy_v3_v3_char(&varray[start+9], &mcol[i*12+6]);
00724             copy_v3_v3_char(&varray[start+12], &mcol[i*12+9]);
00725             copy_v3_v3_char(&varray[start+15], &mcol[i*12]);
00726             index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 9;
00727         }
00728     }
00729 }
00730 
00731 static void copy_mcol_uc3(unsigned char *v, unsigned char *col)
00732 {
00733     v[0] = col[3];
00734     v[1] = col[2];
00735     v[2] = col[1];
00736 }
00737 
00738 /* treat varray_ as an array of MCol, four MCol's per face */
00739 static void GPU_buffer_copy_mcol(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray_, int *index, int *mat_orig_to_new, void *user)
00740 {
00741     int i, totface;
00742     unsigned char *varray = (unsigned char *)varray_;
00743     unsigned char *mcol = (unsigned char *)user;
00744     MFace *f = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00745 
00746     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00747     for (i=0; i < totface; i++, f++) {
00748         int start = index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]];
00749 
00750         /* v1 v2 v3 */
00751         copy_mcol_uc3(&varray[start], &mcol[i*16]);
00752         copy_mcol_uc3(&varray[start+3], &mcol[i*16+4]);
00753         copy_mcol_uc3(&varray[start+6], &mcol[i*16+8]);
00754         index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 9;
00755 
00756         if (f->v4) {
00757             /* v3 v4 v1 */
00758             copy_mcol_uc3(&varray[start+9], &mcol[i*16+8]);
00759             copy_mcol_uc3(&varray[start+12], &mcol[i*16+12]);
00760             copy_mcol_uc3(&varray[start+15], &mcol[i*16]);
00761             index[mat_orig_to_new[f->mat_nr]] += 9;
00762         }
00763     }
00764 }
00765 
00766 static void GPU_buffer_copy_edge(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray_, int *UNUSED(index), int *UNUSED(mat_orig_to_new), void *UNUSED(user))
00767 {
00768     MEdge *medge;
00769     unsigned int *varray = (unsigned int *)varray_;
00770     int i, totedge;
00771  
00772     medge = dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
00773     totedge = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00774 
00775     for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++, medge++) {
00776         varray[i*2] = dm->drawObject->vert_points[medge->v1].point_index;
00777         varray[i*2+1] = dm->drawObject->vert_points[medge->v2].point_index;
00778     }
00779 }
00780 
00781 static void GPU_buffer_copy_uvedge(DerivedMesh *dm, float *varray, int *UNUSED(index), int *UNUSED(mat_orig_to_new), void *UNUSED(user))
00782 {
00783     MTFace *tf = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE);
00784     int i, j=0;
00785 
00786     if (!tf)
00787         return;
00788 
00789     for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, tf++) {
00790         MFace mf;
00791         dm->getTessFace(dm,i,&mf);
00792 
00793         copy_v2_v2(&varray[j],tf->uv[0]);
00794         copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+2],tf->uv[1]);
00795 
00796         copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+4],tf->uv[1]);
00797         copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+6],tf->uv[2]);
00798 
00799         if (!mf.v4) {
00800             copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+8],tf->uv[2]);
00801             copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+10],tf->uv[0]);
00802             j+=12;
00803         }
00804         else {
00805             copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+8],tf->uv[2]);
00806             copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+10],tf->uv[3]);
00807 
00808             copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+12],tf->uv[3]);
00809             copy_v2_v2(&varray[j+14],tf->uv[0]);
00810             j+=16;
00811         }
00812     }
00813 }
00814 
00815 /* get the DerivedMesh's MCols; choose (in decreasing order of
00816  * preference) from CD_ID_MCOL, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL, or CD_MCOL */
00817 static MCol *gpu_buffer_color_type(DerivedMesh *dm)
00818 {
00819     MCol *c;
00820     int type;
00821 
00822     type = CD_ID_MCOL;
00823     c = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
00824     if (!c) {
00825         type = CD_PREVIEW_MCOL;
00826         c = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
00827         if (!c) {
00828             type = CD_MCOL;
00829             c = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
00830         }
00831     }
00832 
00833     dm->drawObject->colType = type;
00834     return c;
00835 }
00836 
00837 typedef enum {
00838     GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX = 0,
00839     GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL,
00840     GPU_BUFFER_COLOR,
00841     GPU_BUFFER_UV,
00842     GPU_BUFFER_EDGE,
00843     GPU_BUFFER_UVEDGE,
00844 } GPUBufferType;
00845 
00846 typedef struct {
00847     GPUBufferCopyFunc copy;
00848     GLenum gl_buffer_type;
00849     int vector_size;
00850 } GPUBufferTypeSettings;
00851 
00852 const GPUBufferTypeSettings gpu_buffer_type_settings[] = {
00853     {GPU_buffer_copy_vertex, GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 3},
00854     {GPU_buffer_copy_normal, GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 3},
00855     {GPU_buffer_copy_mcol, GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 3},
00856     {GPU_buffer_copy_uv, GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 2},
00857     {GPU_buffer_copy_edge, GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 2},
00858     {GPU_buffer_copy_uvedge, GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 4}
00859 };
00860 
00861 /* get the GPUDrawObject buffer associated with a type */
00862 static GPUBuffer **gpu_drawobject_buffer_from_type(GPUDrawObject *gdo, GPUBufferType type)
00863 {
00864     switch(type) {
00865     case GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX:
00866         return &gdo->points;
00867     case GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL:
00868         return &gdo->normals;
00869     case GPU_BUFFER_COLOR:
00870         return &gdo->colors;
00871     case GPU_BUFFER_UV:
00872         return &gdo->uv;
00873     case GPU_BUFFER_EDGE:
00874         return &gdo->edges;
00875     case GPU_BUFFER_UVEDGE:
00876         return &gdo->uvedges;
00877     default:
00878         return NULL;
00879     }
00880 }
00881 
00882 /* get the amount of space to allocate for a buffer of a particular type */
00883 static int gpu_buffer_size_from_type(DerivedMesh *dm, GPUBufferType type)
00884 {
00885     switch(type) {
00886     case GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX:
00887         return sizeof(float)*3 * (dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point + dm->drawObject->tot_loose_point);
00888     case GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL:
00889         return sizeof(float)*3*dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point;
00890     case GPU_BUFFER_COLOR:
00891         return sizeof(char)*3*dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point;
00892     case GPU_BUFFER_UV:
00893         return sizeof(float)*2*dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point;
00894     case GPU_BUFFER_EDGE:
00895         return sizeof(int)*2*dm->drawObject->totedge;
00896     case GPU_BUFFER_UVEDGE:
00897         /* each face gets 3 points, 3 edges per triangle, and
00898          * each edge has its own, non-shared coords, so each
00899          * tri corner needs minimum of 4 floats, quads used
00900          * less so here we can over allocate and assume all
00901          * tris. */
00902         return sizeof(float) * 4 * dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point;
00903     default:
00904         return -1;
00905     }
00906 }
00907 
00908 /* call gpu_buffer_setup with settings for a particular type of buffer */
00909 static GPUBuffer *gpu_buffer_setup_type(DerivedMesh *dm, GPUBufferType type)
00910 {
00911     const GPUBufferTypeSettings *ts;
00912     void *user_data = NULL;
00913     GPUBuffer *buf;
00914 
00915     ts = &gpu_buffer_type_settings[type];
00916 
00917     /* special handling for MCol and UV buffers */
00918     if (type == GPU_BUFFER_COLOR) {
00919         if (!(user_data = gpu_buffer_color_type(dm)))
00920             return NULL;
00921     }
00922     else if (type == GPU_BUFFER_UV) {
00923         if (!DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE))
00924             return NULL;
00925     }
00926 
00927     buf = gpu_buffer_setup(dm, dm->drawObject, ts->vector_size,
00928                            gpu_buffer_size_from_type(dm, type),
00929                            ts->gl_buffer_type, user_data, ts->copy);
00930 
00931     return buf;
00932 }
00933 
00934 /* get the buffer of `type', initializing the GPUDrawObject and
00935  * buffer if needed */
00936 static GPUBuffer *gpu_buffer_setup_common(DerivedMesh *dm, GPUBufferType type)
00937 {
00938     GPUBuffer **buf;
00939     
00940     if (!dm->drawObject)
00941         dm->drawObject = GPU_drawobject_new(dm);
00942 
00943     buf = gpu_drawobject_buffer_from_type(dm->drawObject, type);
00944     if (!(*buf))
00945         *buf = gpu_buffer_setup_type(dm, type);
00946 
00947     return *buf;
00948 }
00949 
00950 void GPU_vertex_setup(DerivedMesh *dm)
00951 {
00952     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX))
00953         return;
00954 
00955     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00956     if (useVBOs) {
00957         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->points->id);
00958         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
00959     }
00960     else {
00961         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, dm->drawObject->points->pointer);
00962     }
00963     
00964     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX_STATE;
00965 }
00966 
00967 void GPU_normal_setup(DerivedMesh *dm)
00968 {
00969     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL))
00970         return;
00971 
00972     glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00973     if (useVBOs) {
00974         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->normals->id);
00975         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
00976     }
00977     else {
00978         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, dm->drawObject->normals->pointer);
00979     }
00980 
00981     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL_STATE;
00982 }
00983 
00984 void GPU_uv_setup(DerivedMesh *dm)
00985 {
00986     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_UV))
00987         return;
00988 
00989     glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00990     if (useVBOs) {
00991         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->uv->id);
00992         glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
00993     }
00994     else {
00995         glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, dm->drawObject->uv->pointer);
00996     }
00997 
00998     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_TEXCOORD_STATE;
00999 }
01000 
01001 void GPU_color_setup(DerivedMesh *dm)
01002 {
01003     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_COLOR))
01004         return;
01005 
01006     glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
01007     if (useVBOs) {
01008         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->colors->id);
01009         glColorPointer(3, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0, 0);
01010     }
01011     else {
01012         glColorPointer(3, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0, dm->drawObject->colors->pointer);
01013     }
01014 
01015     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE;
01016 }
01017 
01018 void GPU_edge_setup(DerivedMesh *dm)
01019 {
01020     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_EDGE))
01021         return;
01022 
01023     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX))
01024         return;
01025 
01026     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01027     if (useVBOs) {
01028         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->points->id);
01029         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
01030     }
01031     else {
01032         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, dm->drawObject->points->pointer);
01033     }
01034     
01035     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX_STATE;
01036 
01037     if (useVBOs)
01038         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->edges->id);
01039 
01040     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_ELEMENT_STATE;
01041 }
01042 
01043 void GPU_uvedge_setup(DerivedMesh *dm)
01044 {
01045     if (!gpu_buffer_setup_common(dm, GPU_BUFFER_UVEDGE))
01046         return;
01047 
01048     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01049     if (useVBOs) {
01050         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, dm->drawObject->uvedges->id);
01051         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
01052     }
01053     else {
01054         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, dm->drawObject->uvedges->pointer);
01055     }
01056     
01057     GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX_STATE;
01058 }
01059 
01060 static int GPU_typesize(int type)
01061 {
01062     switch(type) {
01063     case GL_FLOAT:
01064         return sizeof(float);
01065     case GL_INT:
01066         return sizeof(int);
01067     case GL_UNSIGNED_INT:
01068         return sizeof(unsigned int);
01069     case GL_BYTE:
01070         return sizeof(char);
01071     case GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE:
01072         return sizeof(unsigned char);
01073     default:
01074         return 0;
01075     }
01076 }
01077 
01078 int GPU_attrib_element_size(GPUAttrib data[], int numdata)
01079 {
01080     int i, elementsize = 0;
01081 
01082     for (i = 0; i < numdata; i++) {
01083         int typesize = GPU_typesize(data[i].type);
01084         if (typesize != 0)
01085             elementsize += typesize*data[i].size;
01086     }
01087     return elementsize;
01088 }
01089 
01090 void GPU_interleaved_attrib_setup(GPUBuffer *buffer, GPUAttrib data[], int numdata)
01091 {
01092     int i;
01093     int elementsize;
01094     intptr_t offset = 0;
01095 
01096     for (i = 0; i < MAX_GPU_ATTRIB_DATA; i++) {
01097         if (attribData[i].index != -1) {
01098             glDisableVertexAttribArrayARB(attribData[i].index);
01099         }
01100         else
01101             break;
01102     }
01103     elementsize = GPU_attrib_element_size(data, numdata);
01104 
01105     if (useVBOs) {
01106         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffer->id);
01107         for (i = 0; i < numdata; i++) {
01108             glEnableVertexAttribArrayARB(data[i].index);
01109             glVertexAttribPointerARB(data[i].index, data[i].size, data[i].type,
01110                          GL_FALSE, elementsize, (void *)offset);
01111             offset += data[i].size*GPU_typesize(data[i].type);
01112 
01113             attribData[i].index = data[i].index;
01114             attribData[i].size = data[i].size;
01115             attribData[i].type = data[i].type;
01116         }
01117         attribData[numdata].index = -1;
01118     }
01119     else {
01120         for (i = 0; i < numdata; i++) {
01121             glEnableVertexAttribArrayARB(data[i].index);
01122             glVertexAttribPointerARB(data[i].index, data[i].size, data[i].type,
01123                          GL_FALSE, elementsize, (char *)buffer->pointer + offset);
01124             offset += data[i].size*GPU_typesize(data[i].type);
01125         }
01126     }
01127 }
01128 
01129 
01130 void GPU_buffer_unbind(void)
01131 {
01132     int i;
01133 
01134     if (GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX_STATE)
01135         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01136     if (GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL_STATE)
01137         glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
01138     if (GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_TEXCOORD_STATE)
01139         glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
01140     if (GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE)
01141         glDisableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
01142     if (GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_ELEMENT_STATE) {
01143         if (useVBOs) {
01144             glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01145         }
01146     }
01147     GLStates &= !(GPU_BUFFER_VERTEX_STATE | GPU_BUFFER_NORMAL_STATE |
01148                   GPU_BUFFER_TEXCOORD_STATE | GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE |
01149                   GPU_BUFFER_ELEMENT_STATE);
01150 
01151     for (i = 0; i < MAX_GPU_ATTRIB_DATA; i++) {
01152         if (attribData[i].index != -1) {
01153             glDisableVertexAttribArrayARB(attribData[i].index);
01154         }
01155         else
01156             break;
01157     }
01158 
01159     if (useVBOs)
01160         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01161 }
01162 
01163 /* confusion: code in cdderivedmesh calls both GPU_color_setup and
01164  * GPU_color3_upload; both of these set the `colors' buffer, so seems
01165  * like it will just needlessly overwrite? --nicholas */
01166 void GPU_color3_upload(DerivedMesh *dm, unsigned char *data)
01167 {
01168     if (dm->drawObject == 0)
01169         dm->drawObject = GPU_drawobject_new(dm);
01170     GPU_buffer_free(dm->drawObject->colors);
01171 
01172     dm->drawObject->colors = gpu_buffer_setup(dm, dm->drawObject, 3,
01173                           sizeof(char)*3*dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point,
01174                           GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, data, GPU_buffer_copy_color3);
01175 }
01176 
01177 void GPU_color_switch(int mode)
01178 {
01179     if (mode) {
01180         if (!(GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE))
01181             glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
01182         GLStates |= GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE;
01183     }
01184     else {
01185         if (GLStates & GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE)
01186             glDisableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
01187         GLStates &= (!GPU_BUFFER_COLOR_STATE);
01188     }
01189 }
01190 
01191 /* return 1 if drawing should be done using old immediate-mode
01192  * code, 0 otherwise */
01193 int GPU_buffer_legacy(DerivedMesh *dm)
01194 {
01195     int test= (U.gameflags & USER_DISABLE_VBO);
01196     if (test)
01197         return 1;
01198 
01199     if (dm->drawObject == 0)
01200         dm->drawObject = GPU_drawobject_new(dm);
01201     return dm->drawObject->legacy;
01202 }
01203 
01204 void *GPU_buffer_lock(GPUBuffer *buffer)
01205 {
01206     float *varray;
01207 
01208     if (!buffer)
01209         return 0;
01210 
01211     if (useVBOs) {
01212         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffer->id);
01213         varray = glMapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB);
01214         return varray;
01215     }
01216     else {
01217         return buffer->pointer;
01218     }
01219 }
01220 
01221 void *GPU_buffer_lock_stream(GPUBuffer *buffer)
01222 {
01223     float *varray;
01224 
01225     if (!buffer)
01226         return 0;
01227 
01228     if (useVBOs) {
01229         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffer->id);
01230         /* discard previous data, avoid stalling gpu */
01231         glBufferDataARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffer->size, 0, GL_STREAM_DRAW_ARB);
01232         varray = glMapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB);
01233         return varray;
01234     }
01235     else {
01236         return buffer->pointer;
01237     }
01238 }
01239 
01240 void GPU_buffer_unlock(GPUBuffer *buffer)
01241 {
01242     if (useVBOs) {
01243         if (buffer) {
01244             /* note: this operation can fail, could return
01245              * an error code from this function? */
01246             glUnmapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB);
01247         }
01248         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01249     }
01250 }
01251 
01252 /* used for drawing edges */
01253 void GPU_buffer_draw_elements(GPUBuffer *elements, unsigned int mode, int start, int count)
01254 {
01255     glDrawElements(mode, count, GL_UNSIGNED_INT,
01256                (useVBOs ?
01257             (void*)(start * sizeof(unsigned int)) :
01258             ((int*)elements->pointer) + start));
01259 }
01260 
01261 
01262 /* XXX: the rest of the code in this file is used for optimized PBVH
01263  * drawing and doesn't interact at all with the buffer code above */
01264 
01265 /* Convenience struct for building the VBO. */
01266 typedef struct {
01267     float co[3];
01268     short no[3];
01269 } VertexBufferFormat;
01270 
01271 struct GPU_Buffers {
01272     /* opengl buffer handles */
01273     GLuint vert_buf, index_buf;
01274     GLenum index_type;
01275 
01276     /* mesh pointers in case buffer allocation fails */
01277     MFace *mface;
01278     MVert *mvert;
01279     int *face_indices;
01280     int totface;
01281 
01282     /* grid pointers */
01283     DMGridData **grids;
01284     const DMFlagMat *grid_flag_mats;
01285     const BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden;
01286     int *grid_indices;
01287     int totgrid;
01288     int gridsize;
01289     int has_hidden;
01290 
01291     unsigned int tot_tri, tot_quad;
01292 };
01293 
01294 void GPU_update_mesh_buffers(GPU_Buffers *buffers, MVert *mvert,
01295             int *vert_indices, int totvert)
01296 {
01297     VertexBufferFormat *vert_data;
01298     int i;
01299 
01300     if (buffers->vert_buf) {
01301         /* Build VBO */
01302         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffers->vert_buf);
01303         glBufferDataARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB,
01304                         sizeof(VertexBufferFormat) * totvert,
01305                         NULL, GL_STATIC_DRAW_ARB);
01306         vert_data = glMapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB);
01307 
01308         if (vert_data) {
01309             for (i = 0; i < totvert; ++i) {
01310                 MVert *v = mvert + vert_indices[i];
01311                 VertexBufferFormat *out = vert_data + i;
01312 
01313                 copy_v3_v3(out->co, v->co);
01314                 memcpy(out->no, v->no, sizeof(short) * 3);
01315             }
01316 
01317             glUnmapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB);
01318         }
01319         else {
01320             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &buffers->vert_buf);
01321             buffers->vert_buf = 0;
01322         }
01323 
01324         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01325     }
01326 
01327     buffers->mvert = mvert;
01328 }
01329 
01330 GPU_Buffers *GPU_build_mesh_buffers(int (*face_vert_indices)[4],
01331                                     MFace *mface, MVert *mvert,
01332                                     int *face_indices,
01333                                     int totface)
01334 {
01335     GPU_Buffers *buffers;
01336     unsigned short *tri_data;
01337     int i, j, k, tottri;
01338 
01339     buffers = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPU_Buffers), "GPU_Buffers");
01340     buffers->index_type = GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT;
01341 
01342     /* Count the number of visible triangles */
01343     for (i = 0, tottri = 0; i < totface; ++i) {
01344         const MFace *f = &mface[face_indices[i]];
01345         if (!paint_is_face_hidden(f, mvert))
01346             tottri += f->v4 ? 2 : 1;
01347     }
01348     
01349     if (GLEW_ARB_vertex_buffer_object && !(U.gameflags & USER_DISABLE_VBO))
01350         glGenBuffersARB(1, &buffers->index_buf);
01351 
01352     if (buffers->index_buf) {
01353         /* Generate index buffer object */
01354         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffers->index_buf);
01355         glBufferDataARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB,
01356                         sizeof(unsigned short) * tottri * 3, NULL, GL_STATIC_DRAW_ARB);
01357 
01358         /* Fill the triangle buffer */
01359         tri_data = glMapBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB);
01360         if (tri_data) {
01361             for (i = 0; i < totface; ++i) {
01362                 const MFace *f = mface + face_indices[i];
01363                 int v[3];
01364 
01365                 /* Skip hidden faces */
01366                 if (paint_is_face_hidden(f, mvert))
01367                     continue;
01368 
01369                 v[0]= 0;
01370                 v[1]= 1;
01371                 v[2]= 2;
01372 
01373                 for (j = 0; j < (f->v4 ? 2 : 1); ++j) {
01374                     for (k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
01375                         *tri_data = face_vert_indices[i][v[k]];
01376                         ++tri_data;
01377                     }
01378                     v[0] = 3;
01379                     v[1] = 0;
01380                     v[2] = 2;
01381                 }
01382             }
01383             glUnmapBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB);
01384         }
01385         else {
01386             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &buffers->index_buf);
01387             buffers->index_buf = 0;
01388         }
01389 
01390         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01391     }
01392 
01393     if (buffers->index_buf)
01394         glGenBuffersARB(1, &buffers->vert_buf);
01395 
01396     buffers->tot_tri = tottri;
01397 
01398     buffers->mface = mface;
01399     buffers->face_indices = face_indices;
01400     buffers->totface = totface;
01401 
01402     return buffers;
01403 }
01404 
01405 void GPU_update_grid_buffers(GPU_Buffers *buffers, DMGridData **grids,
01406     const DMFlagMat *grid_flag_mats, int *grid_indices, int totgrid, int gridsize)
01407 {
01408     DMGridData *vert_data;
01409     int i, j, k, totvert;
01410 
01411     totvert= gridsize*gridsize*totgrid;
01412 
01413     /* Build VBO */
01414     if (buffers->vert_buf) {
01415         int smooth = grid_flag_mats[grid_indices[0]].flag & ME_SMOOTH;
01416 
01417         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffers->vert_buf);
01418         glBufferDataARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB,
01419                         sizeof(DMGridData) * totvert,
01420                         NULL, GL_STATIC_DRAW_ARB);
01421         vert_data = glMapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB);
01422         if (vert_data) {
01423             for (i = 0; i < totgrid; ++i) {
01424                 DMGridData *grid= grids[grid_indices[i]];
01425                 memcpy(vert_data, grid, sizeof(DMGridData)*gridsize*gridsize);
01426 
01427                 if (!smooth) {
01428                     /* for flat shading, recalc normals and set the last vertex of
01429                      * each quad in the index buffer to have the flat normal as
01430                      * that is what opengl will use */
01431                     for (j = 0; j < gridsize-1; ++j) {
01432                         for (k = 0; k < gridsize-1; ++k) {
01433                             float fno[3];
01434                             normal_quad_v3(fno,
01435                                 grid[(j+1)*gridsize + k].co,
01436                                 grid[(j+1)*gridsize + k+1].co,
01437                                 grid[j*gridsize + k+1].co,
01438                                 grid[j*gridsize + k].co);
01439 
01440                             copy_v3_v3(vert_data[(j+1)*gridsize + (k+1)].no, fno);
01441                         }
01442                     }
01443                 }
01444 
01445                 vert_data += gridsize*gridsize;
01446             }
01447             glUnmapBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB);
01448         }
01449         else {
01450             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &buffers->vert_buf);
01451             buffers->vert_buf = 0;
01452         }
01453         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01454     }
01455 
01456     buffers->grids = grids;
01457     buffers->grid_indices = grid_indices;
01458     buffers->totgrid = totgrid;
01459     buffers->gridsize = gridsize;
01460     buffers->grid_flag_mats = grid_flag_mats;
01461 
01462     //printf("node updated %p\n", buffers);
01463 }
01464 
01465 /* Returns the number of visible quads in the nodes' grids. */
01466 static int gpu_count_grid_quads(BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden,
01467                                 int *grid_indices, int totgrid,
01468                                 int gridsize)
01469 {
01470     int gridarea = (gridsize-1) * (gridsize-1);
01471     int i, x, y, totquad;
01472 
01473     /* grid hidden layer is present, so have to check each grid for
01474      * visiblity */
01475 
01476     for (i = 0, totquad = 0; i < totgrid; i++) {
01477         const BLI_bitmap gh = grid_hidden[grid_indices[i]];
01478 
01479         if (gh) {
01480             /* grid hidden are present, have to check each element */
01481             for (y = 0; y < gridsize-1; y++) {
01482                 for (x = 0; x < gridsize-1; x++) {
01483                     if (!paint_is_grid_face_hidden(gh, gridsize, x, y))
01484                         totquad++;
01485                 }
01486             }
01487         }
01488         else
01489             totquad += gridarea;
01490     }
01491 
01492     return totquad;
01493 }
01494 
01495 /* Build the element array buffer of grid indices using either
01496  * unsigned shorts or unsigned ints. */
01497 #define FILL_QUAD_BUFFER(type_, tot_quad_, buffer_)                     \
01498     {                                                                   \
01499         type_ *quad_data;                                               \
01500         int offset = 0;                                                 \
01501         int i, j, k;                                                    \
01502                                                                         \
01503         glBufferDataARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB,                    \
01504                         sizeof(type_) * (tot_quad_) * 4, NULL,          \
01505                         GL_STATIC_DRAW_ARB);                            \
01506                                                                         \
01507         /* Fill the quad buffer */                                      \
01508         quad_data = glMapBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB,         \
01509                                    GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB);                  \
01510         if (quad_data) {                                                \
01511             for (i = 0; i < totgrid; ++i) {                             \
01512                 BLI_bitmap gh = NULL;                                   \
01513                 if (grid_hidden)                                        \
01514                     gh = grid_hidden[(grid_indices)[i]];                \
01515                                                                         \
01516                 for (j = 0; j < gridsize-1; ++j) {                      \
01517                     for (k = 0; k < gridsize-1; ++k) {                  \
01518                         /* Skip hidden grid face */                     \
01519                         if (gh &&                                       \
01520                            paint_is_grid_face_hidden(gh,                \
01521                                                      gridsize, k, j))   \
01522                             continue;                                   \
01523                                                                         \
01524                         *(quad_data++)= offset + j*gridsize + k+1;      \
01525                         *(quad_data++)= offset + j*gridsize + k;        \
01526                         *(quad_data++)= offset + (j+1)*gridsize + k;    \
01527                         *(quad_data++)= offset + (j+1)*gridsize + k+1;  \
01528                     }                                                   \
01529                 }                                                       \
01530                                                                         \
01531                 offset += gridsize*gridsize;                            \
01532             }                                                           \
01533             glUnmapBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB);              \
01534         }                                                               \
01535         else {                                                          \
01536             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &(buffer_));                          \
01537             (buffer_) = 0;                                              \
01538         }                                                               \
01539     }
01540 /* end FILL_QUAD_BUFFER */
01541 
01542 static GLuint gpu_get_grid_buffer(int gridsize, GLenum *index_type, unsigned *totquad)
01543 {
01544     static int prev_gridsize = -1;
01545     static GLenum prev_index_type = 0;
01546     static GLuint buffer = 0;
01547     static unsigned prev_totquad;
01548 
01549     /* used in the FILL_QUAD_BUFFER macro */
01550     const BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden = NULL;
01551     int *grid_indices = NULL;
01552     int totgrid = 1;
01553 
01554     /* VBO is disabled; delete the previous buffer (if it exists) and
01555      * return an invalid handle */
01556     if (!GLEW_ARB_vertex_buffer_object || (U.gameflags & USER_DISABLE_VBO)) {
01557         if (buffer)
01558             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &buffer);
01559         return 0;
01560     }
01561 
01562     /* VBO is already built */
01563     if (buffer && prev_gridsize == gridsize) {
01564         *index_type = prev_index_type;
01565         *totquad = prev_totquad;
01566         return buffer;
01567     }
01568 
01569     /* Build new VBO */
01570     glGenBuffersARB(1, &buffer);
01571     if (buffer) {
01572         *totquad= (gridsize-1)*(gridsize-1);
01573 
01574         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffer);
01575 
01576         if (gridsize * gridsize < USHRT_MAX) {
01577             *index_type = GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT;
01578             FILL_QUAD_BUFFER(unsigned short, *totquad, buffer);
01579         }
01580         else {
01581             *index_type = GL_UNSIGNED_INT;
01582             FILL_QUAD_BUFFER(unsigned int, *totquad, buffer);
01583         }
01584 
01585         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01586     }
01587 
01588     prev_gridsize = gridsize;
01589     prev_index_type = *index_type;
01590     prev_totquad = *totquad;
01591     return buffer;
01592 }
01593 
01594 GPU_Buffers *GPU_build_grid_buffers(int *grid_indices, int totgrid,
01595                                     BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden, int gridsize)
01596 {
01597     GPU_Buffers *buffers;
01598     int totquad;
01599     int fully_visible_totquad = (gridsize-1) * (gridsize-1) * totgrid;
01600 
01601     buffers = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPU_Buffers), "GPU_Buffers");
01602     buffers->grid_hidden = grid_hidden;
01603     buffers->gridsize = gridsize;
01604     buffers->totgrid = totgrid;
01605 
01606     /* Count the number of quads */
01607     totquad= gpu_count_grid_quads(grid_hidden, grid_indices, totgrid, gridsize);
01608 
01609     if (totquad == fully_visible_totquad) {
01610         buffers->index_buf = gpu_get_grid_buffer(gridsize, &buffers->index_type, &buffers->tot_quad);
01611         buffers->has_hidden = 0;
01612     }
01613     else if (GLEW_ARB_vertex_buffer_object && !(U.gameflags & USER_DISABLE_VBO)) {
01614         /* Build new VBO */
01615         glGenBuffersARB(1, &buffers->index_buf);
01616         if (buffers->index_buf) {
01617             buffers->tot_quad= totquad;
01618 
01619             glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffers->index_buf);
01620 
01621             if (totgrid * gridsize * gridsize < USHRT_MAX) {
01622                 buffers->index_type = GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT;
01623                 FILL_QUAD_BUFFER(unsigned short, totquad, buffers->index_buf);
01624             }
01625             else {
01626                 buffers->index_type = GL_UNSIGNED_INT;
01627                 FILL_QUAD_BUFFER(unsigned int, totquad, buffers->index_buf);
01628             }
01629 
01630             glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01631         }
01632 
01633         buffers->has_hidden = 1;
01634     }
01635 
01636     /* Build coord/normal VBO */
01637     if (buffers->index_buf)
01638         glGenBuffersARB(1, &buffers->vert_buf);
01639 
01640     return buffers;
01641 }
01642 
01643 #undef FILL_QUAD_BUFFER
01644 
01645 static void gpu_draw_buffers_legacy_mesh(GPU_Buffers *buffers, int smooth)
01646 {
01647     const MVert *mvert = buffers->mvert;
01648     int i, j;
01649 
01650     for (i = 0; i < buffers->totface; ++i) {
01651         MFace *f = buffers->mface + buffers->face_indices[i];
01652         int S = f->v4 ? 4 : 3;
01653         unsigned int *fv = &f->v1;
01654 
01655         if (paint_is_face_hidden(f, buffers->mvert))
01656             continue;
01657 
01658         glBegin((f->v4)? GL_QUADS: GL_TRIANGLES);
01659 
01660         if (smooth) {
01661             for (j = 0; j < S; j++) {
01662                 glNormal3sv(mvert[fv[j]].no);
01663                 glVertex3fv(mvert[fv[j]].co);
01664             }
01665         }
01666         else {
01667             float fno[3];
01668 
01669             /* calculate face normal */
01670             if (f->v4) {
01671                 normal_quad_v3(fno, mvert[fv[0]].co, mvert[fv[1]].co,
01672                                mvert[fv[2]].co, mvert[fv[3]].co);
01673             }
01674             else
01675                 normal_tri_v3(fno, mvert[fv[0]].co, mvert[fv[1]].co, mvert[fv[2]].co);
01676             glNormal3fv(fno);
01677             
01678             for (j = 0; j < S; j++)
01679                 glVertex3fv(mvert[fv[j]].co);
01680         }
01681         
01682         glEnd();
01683     }
01684 }
01685 
01686 static void gpu_draw_buffers_legacy_grids(GPU_Buffers *buffers, int smooth)
01687 {
01688     int i, j, x, y, gridsize = buffers->gridsize;
01689 
01690     for (i = 0; i < buffers->totgrid; ++i) {
01691         int g = buffers->grid_indices[i];
01692         const DMGridData *grid = buffers->grids[g];
01693         BLI_bitmap gh = buffers->grid_hidden[g];
01694 
01695         /* TODO: could use strips with hiding as well */
01696 
01697         if (gh) {
01698             glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01699             
01700             for (y = 0; y < gridsize-1; y++) {
01701                 for (x = 0; x < gridsize-1; x++) {
01702                     const DMGridData *e[4] = {
01703                         &grid[y*gridsize + x],
01704                         &grid[(y+1)*gridsize + x],
01705                         &grid[(y+1)*gridsize + x+1],
01706                         &grid[y*gridsize + x+1]
01707                     };
01708 
01709                     /* skip face if any of its corners are hidden */
01710                     if (paint_is_grid_face_hidden(gh, gridsize, x, y))
01711                         continue;
01712 
01713                     if (smooth) {
01714                         for (j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
01715                             glNormal3fv(e[j]->no);
01716                             glVertex3fv(e[j]->co);
01717                         }
01718                     }
01719                     else {
01720                         float fno[3];
01721                         normal_quad_v3(fno, e[0]->co, e[1]->co, e[2]->co, e[3]->co);
01722                         glNormal3fv(fno);
01723 
01724                         for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
01725                             glVertex3fv(e[j]->co);
01726                     }
01727                 }
01728             }
01729 
01730             glEnd();
01731         }
01732         else if (smooth) {
01733             for (y = 0; y < gridsize-1; y++) {
01734                 glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
01735                 for (x = 0; x < gridsize; x++) {
01736                     const DMGridData *a = &grid[y*gridsize + x];
01737                     const DMGridData *b = &grid[(y+1)*gridsize + x];
01738 
01739                     glNormal3fv(a->no);
01740                     glVertex3fv(a->co);
01741                     glNormal3fv(b->no);
01742                     glVertex3fv(b->co);
01743                 }
01744                 glEnd();
01745             }
01746         }
01747         else {
01748             for (y = 0; y < gridsize-1; y++) {
01749                 glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
01750                 for (x = 0; x < gridsize; x++) {
01751                     const DMGridData *a = &grid[y*gridsize + x];
01752                     const DMGridData *b = &grid[(y+1)*gridsize + x];
01753 
01754                     if (x > 0) {
01755                         const DMGridData *c = &grid[y*gridsize + x-1];
01756                         const DMGridData *d = &grid[(y+1)*gridsize + x-1];
01757                         float fno[3];
01758                         normal_quad_v3(fno, d->co, b->co, a->co, c->co);
01759                         glNormal3fv(fno);
01760                     }
01761 
01762                     glVertex3fv(a->co);
01763                     glVertex3fv(b->co);
01764                 }
01765                 glEnd();
01766             }
01767         }
01768     }
01769 }
01770 
01771 void GPU_draw_buffers(GPU_Buffers *buffers, DMSetMaterial setMaterial)
01772 {
01773     int smooth = 0;
01774 
01775     if (buffers->totface) {
01776         const MFace *f = &buffers->mface[buffers->face_indices[0]];
01777         if (!setMaterial(f->mat_nr + 1, NULL))
01778             return;
01779 
01780         smooth = f->flag & ME_SMOOTH;
01781         glShadeModel(smooth ? GL_SMOOTH: GL_FLAT);
01782     }
01783     else if (buffers->totgrid) {
01784         const DMFlagMat *f = &buffers->grid_flag_mats[buffers->grid_indices[0]];
01785         if (!setMaterial(f->mat_nr + 1, NULL))
01786             return;
01787 
01788         smooth = f->flag & ME_SMOOTH;
01789         glShadeModel(smooth ? GL_SMOOTH: GL_FLAT);
01790     }
01791 
01792     if (buffers->vert_buf && buffers->index_buf) {
01793         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01794         glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
01795 
01796         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffers->vert_buf);
01797         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, buffers->index_buf);
01798 
01799         if (buffers->tot_quad) {
01800             unsigned offset = 0;
01801             int i, last = buffers->has_hidden ? 1 : buffers->totgrid;
01802             for (i = 0; i < last; i++) {
01803                 glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, sizeof(DMGridData), offset + (char*)offsetof(DMGridData, co));
01804                 glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, sizeof(DMGridData), offset + (char*)offsetof(DMGridData, no));
01805                 
01806                 glDrawElements(GL_QUADS, buffers->tot_quad * 4, buffers->index_type, 0);
01807 
01808                 offset += buffers->gridsize * buffers->gridsize * sizeof(DMGridData);
01809             }
01810         }
01811         else {
01812             glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, sizeof(VertexBufferFormat), (void*)offsetof(VertexBufferFormat, co));
01813             glNormalPointer(GL_SHORT, sizeof(VertexBufferFormat), (void*)offsetof(VertexBufferFormat, no));
01814 
01815             glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, buffers->tot_tri * 3, buffers->index_type, 0);
01816         }
01817 
01818         glBindBufferARB(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01819         glBindBufferARB(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER_ARB, 0);
01820 
01821         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
01822         glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
01823     }
01824     /* fallbacks if we are out of memory or VBO is disabled */
01825     else if (buffers->totface) {
01826         gpu_draw_buffers_legacy_mesh(buffers, smooth);
01827     }
01828     else if (buffers->totgrid) {
01829         gpu_draw_buffers_legacy_grids(buffers, smooth);
01830     }
01831 }
01832 
01833 void GPU_free_buffers(GPU_Buffers *buffers)
01834 {
01835     if (buffers) {
01836         if (buffers->vert_buf)
01837             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &buffers->vert_buf);
01838         if (buffers->index_buf && (buffers->tot_tri || buffers->has_hidden))
01839             glDeleteBuffersARB(1, &buffers->index_buf);
01840 
01841         MEM_freeN(buffers);
01842     }
01843 }
